titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate on Wednesday April 7, 1993 until Monday, April 19, 1993, and a conditional adjournment of the House on Wednesday April 7, or Thursday April 8, 1993, until Monday April 19, 1993.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/7/1993--Introduced. Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 7 until April 19, 1993.
